articles.title: Partial Article with Missing Date
articles.description: This article has a title and description but no publication date.
articles.author: Alice Johnson
articles.content: This article lacks a date, which should make it invalid.

articles.title: Missing Content and URL
articles.description: An article with title and description but no content or URL.
articles.author: Daniel Lee
